summary: Falkreath/Lakeview Manor Purchase Fix Patch is a simple patch that possibly fixes the relationship between the player and the jarl that conflict purchasing lakeview manor land an getting a housecarl
descriptionHtml:
Falkreath/Lakeview Manor Purchase Fix Patch is a simple patch that possibly fixes the relationship between the player and the jarl that conflict purchasing lakeview manor land an getting a housecarl


Changelog:
* FIXED After you got the jarl letter and the (Im Dragonborn i got your letter) dialougue no showing!
* FIXED Purchase Lakeview manor land from nennya not showing up!
* FIXED Jarl hates the player without reason!

Notes:
* If you got issues with jarl again after helping the jarl or during the dark brotherhood quest by killing his guard
   please unistall this patch run the game and save, then install the patch again it should do the job as always!
   Please if you got any issue's in this patch feel free to contact me!

Credits:
SkulleR
author: SkulleR
